snippet: GLADIS--Paul J. Jr.,66, of Bayonne and formerly Colts Neck, died March 14th after a brief illness. Beloved father, grandfather, son, brother, and uncle. Visitation Friday March 18, 4-8pm at Sweeney Funeral Home, 857 Kennedy Blvd., Bayonne. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GLADIS--Paul J. Jr.,66, of Bayonne and formerly Colts Neck, died March 14th after a brief illness. Beloved father, grandfather, son, brother, and uncle. Visitation Friday March 18, 4-8pm at Sweeney Funeral Home, 857 Kennedy Blvd., Bayonne. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GLADIS, PAUL J. JR.
